scripts.pa: mv public/index.html index; mv src/index.js src/index; cp src/pa/index.html public/index.html; cp src/pa/index.js src/index.js; GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false PUBLIC_URL=https://aicafe1.github.io/vnqa-pa/ react-scripts build; rm -rf pa/docs; mv build pa/docs; mv index public/index.html; mv src/index src/index.js
scripts.sa: mv public/index.html index; mv src/index.js src/index; cp src/sa/index.html public/index.html; cp src/sa/index.js src/index.js; GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false PUBLIC_URL=https://aicafe1.github.io/vnqa-sa/ react-scripts build; rm -rf sa/docs; mv build sa/docs; mv index public/index.html; mv src/index src/index.js
scripts.deploy: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts build; mv docs/CNAME build/; mv docs/*.zip build; rm -rf docs; mv build docs; cp docs/index.html docs/404.html
